name: signbridge-extension
description: SignBridge - Generic Web HSM Signing Protocol Browser Extension

scripts.build: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.pack:chrome: npm run build:chrome && cd dist/chrome && tar -acf ../../signbridge-chrome.zip * && cd ../..
scripts.pack:firefox: npm run build:firefox && cd dist/firefox && tar -acf ../../signbridge-firefox.zip * && cd ../..
scripts.pack: npm run pack:chrome && npm run pack:firefox
